metadata.name: Rain_Part 1-02
metadata.description:
![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F16%2Feditor-OZ2RFD7lxlyQyYLsKCmft.png?alt=media&token=7194e63d-d8ef-4d69-b356-721946560f9b)
![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fgif%2F2023%2F02%2F15%2Feditor-O-4OzN-8kRXXmV-g8qpxj.gif?alt=media&token=30eadcd5-e330-4f68-a7dc-40a183234ef1)

**The video I created combines three of my favorite things – dance, space, and AI – to create a new kind of dance experience. The dancers' movements are enhanced by the use of AI technology, adding a layer of visual effects that seamlessly blend with their performance.**

**Think of it like this: imagine a beautiful painting that comes to life. The dancers are the brushstrokes, the space is the canvas, and the AI technology is like the paint that brings everything together.**

**This video is a celebration of the intersection of art and technology. It's a glimpse into what the future of dance videos could look like, and it showcases how technology can be used to elevate and transform the art of dance.**

**So whether you're a fan of dance, space, or technology, this video has something for everyone. It's a unique and unforgettable experience that combines the best of all worlds."**

이 작품은 Sunny Inspires가 가장 좋아하는 세 가지를 결합한 것이다: 춤, 공간, 그리고 인공지능. 

‘RAIN’은 댄서들의 움직임에 AI기술을 사용하여 그들의 움직임과 완벽하게 어우러지는 시각적 효과의 더함으로써, 이 세가지가 완벽하게 어우러지게 작업하였다. 

이렇게 생각해 보면 어떨까. 댄서들은 붓이고, 공간은 캔버스이며, AI 기술은 모든 것을 하나로 묶는 물감이라고.

이 작품은 예술과 기술의 교차점으로, 댄스 비디오와 영상 아트의 미래를 엿볼 수 있다. 어떻게 기술이 춤의 예술을 향상시키고 변화시키는 데 사용될 수 있는지를 명확하게 보여준다. ‘RAIN’을 보는 사람들이 춤, 우주, 기술 등 그 어떤것의 팬이든 간에, 이 비디오는 그 모든 사람들을 위한 무언가를 담고있다. 

‘RAIN’은 세계 최고의 것들이 결합된 것들을 결과물로, 독특하고 잊을 수 없는 경험이 될 것이다.
</br></br>

![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F14%2Feditor-7g1TtAdjNL4u4aRi28bf1.png?alt=media&token=aa2386fd-536c-40d5-b6a5-eb6f68b5cd55)

**Sunny Inspires is a video producer, the director creates creative videos based on camera work that deviates from the existing framework. He is active as a music video director for K-pop stars such as BTS, New Jeans, LE SSERAFIMS, Seventeen, and Kang Daniel as well.**

Sunny Inspires 감독은 영상 제작자로서 기존 틀에서 벗어난 카메라워크를 바탕으로 크리에이티브한 영상 창작물을 만들어 낸다. 개인 작업물 뿐만 아니라 BTS, New Jeans, LE SSERAFIMS,SEVENTEEN, 강다니엘 등 K-pop 스타들의 댄스비디오, 뮤직비디오 감독으로 활발히 활동 중이다.
</br></br>

![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F14%2Feditor-8nao-gywAoxDF0dBejuwJ.png?alt=media&token=def4f736-f135-4c63-af14-c157a85298bd)
![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F14%2Feditor-tV_j5OK4xH7NsQ70nLs2J.png?alt=media&token=f36f8688-cb82-4295-a687-3d1026dc7bf0)

</br> </br>

![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F14%2Feditor-HdfuO4cZvJdKURdoB12kT.png?alt=media&token=d05884ac-0b09-4794-8a78-08c173b786c2)

**‘Sunny Inspires’ is a dance performance video director, and he have been working in this field for about 8 years now. It all began when he decided to make the move to South Korea, a place that he had always been fascinated with, to pursue his passion for filming dance videos.**

**When He first arrived in South Korea, He had very limited connections and resources, but He was determined to make a name for himself in the industry. He began by working with individual dancers, filming their performances and creating videos that highlighted their unique talents and abilities. Through these early experiences, He honed his skills and developed his own unique style.**

**As His reputation grew, He started to receive more and more requests for his services. He said, “I put my heart and soul into every project, always striving to create something that was truly special and memorable.”**

**Over the years, he’s had the privilege of working with some of the most talented dancers in the industry, and his videos that have been watched by millions of people around the world.** 

**He became one of the most sought after dance performance video directors in South Korea.**

‘Sunny Inspires’ 는 댄스 퍼포먼스 영상 감독으로, 현재 엔터테인먼트 업계에서 약 8년간 활동하고 있다. 
말레이시아에서 온 그에게 있어서 ��국에서의 활동은 정말 큰 도전이었다. 인맥과 환경 모두 그에게 있어서 매우 제한적었지만 ‘Sunny Inspires’는 포기하지 않고 계속해서 영상 작업을 했다. 그리고 댄서들과의 작업을 시작으로 댄스 퍼포먼스에 특화되어 있는 자신의 재능을 발견하고 그 능력을 펼치기 시작했다. 

그는 댄서들의 안무와 공연을 촬영하고 그들의 독특한 재능과 능력을 부각시키며 댄스 씬에서 K-pop씬으로 촬영 영역을 확장시켰다. 이러한 끊임없는 도전과 경험을 통해, 그의 명성은 높아졌고, 수년간 세계적으로 유명한 K-pop 스타들과, 재능있는 댄서들과 일하며 많은 작품들을 만들어냈다. 

그의 비디오는 전세계 수백만 명의 사람들에 의해 시청되었다. ‘Sunny Inspires’는 "저는 모든 프로젝트 하나하나에 심혈을 기울였고, 매 작품마다 사람들의 기억에 남는 특별한 영상으로 만들기 위해 최선을 다해 노력합니다." 라고 말했다. 

’Sunny Inspires’는 한국에서 가장 인기 있는 댄스 공연 비디오 감독 중 한 명이 되었고, 지금도 끊임없는 러브콜을 받고있다.
</br></br>

![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F14%2Feditor-9ri3H0a5YeVQH8Hd48_yF.png?alt=media&token=5bec4972-961d-442a-9462-c56a54b38c7b)

**1.** **Why did you make this NFT?**
- Always have been fascinated by the thought of making an art that can leave behind a legacy. Thought it'd be interesting to give my take on what I see art as.
 </br>

**2.** **What is the concept of this NFT?**
- This NFT is a perfect example of how AI and blockchain technology are being used to create new and exciting forms of digital art. To see how dance is interpreted by AI.
 </br>

**3.** **How did you make it?**
- We did this by shooting a performance video and running it through an AI that tries to analyse the scene and we gave it prompts to alter the imagery of the scene while keeping the dance motion.
</br>
</br>

![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F14%2Feditor-ux8rBTbAUI3XZh3aQiO4T.png?alt=media&token=f8737b11-5b1a-4236-b70b-58f447f6c069)

Using AI to infuse with dance videos involves training a model on a dataset of reference images or videos and then applying the model to the dance video in order to transfer the desired style or effects.

To do this, the first step is to convert the dance video into a sequence of individual frames. Then, each frame is passed through the style transfer algorithm, which applies the desired style to the frame. The output is a new sequence of frames that have the same movement as the original dance video, but with a new, unique look. This can lead to new and exciting forms of visual storytelling in dance video.
</br></br>

![imageURL](https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/xreators-nft-marketplace.appspot.com/o/resource%2Fpublic%2Feditor%2Fimage%2Fpng%2F2023%2F02%2F14%2Feditor-azh-P8mGE1grI1vwIta3p.png?alt=media&token=3d84c1b6-14f6-455d-aa5c-1ed3be98c1d9)

I am excited to explore the world of NFTs and creating unique and limited digital assets. I am currently in the early stages of planning my next NFT project with XREATORS, and one of the things that I am most excited about is the opportunity to collaborate human skills with AI skills. I believe that by finding a harmony between these two elements, we can create something truly special and one-of-a-kind.
 
In this project, I plan to use my expertise in film-making and my experience working with dancers to create a visual narrative which will be enhanced by AI generated animations, and together we will be able to create a unique work of art that pushes the boundaries of what is possible in the world of digital art and collectibles.
 
I am looking forward to bring this unique and innovative work of art to the market, and I can't wait for everyone to see what I have in store.

</br></br>
